content.en: Flow pattern classification: Researchers are exploring the use of artificial intelligence and machine learning algorithms to accurately identify and classify different flow patterns in gas-liquid and two-phase flows. These algorithms, such as artificial neural networks, expert systems, and deep neural networks, are being applied to various signals and data, including conductivity probe signals, pressure fluctuations, ultrasonic data, and void fraction time series. By using these algorithms, scientists hope to improve the understanding and prediction of flow behavior in different systems, such as pipelines and porous media.
content.da: Flowmønsterklassifikation: Forskere undersøger brugen af kunstig intelligens og maskinlæringsalgoritmer til nøjagtigt at identificere og klassificere forskellige flowmønstre i gas-væske og tofasede strømninger. Disse algoritmer, såsom kunstige neurale netværk, ekspertsystemer og dybe neurale netværk, anvendes på forskellige signaler og data, herunder ledningsevnesondesignaler, trykfluktuationer, ultralydsdata og hulrumsbrøktidssignaler. Ved at bruge disse algoritmer håber videnskabsmænd at forbedre forståelsen og forudsigelsen af flowadfærd i forskellige systemer, såsom rørledninger og porøse medier.
